SD_AfterCrecheReflection_28.text: *You did as the Undying Queen asked.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_56.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_56.text: *You entered the Astral Prism. You attacked the one inside.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_27.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_27.text: *Now your own people point their blades at you, Lae'zel of K'liir, Vlaakith's most faithful warrior - just as your dream figure warned.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_39.speaker: Lae'zel
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_39.text: Return the Astral Prism to Vlaakith and regain her favour.

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_63.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_63.text: *But even in reverie, worry gnaws at you like a tadpole at its host.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_33.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_33.text: *Whoever this dream figure, one thing is clear: Vlaakith would sacrifice her own faithful to slay them.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_40.speaker: Lae'zel
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_40.text: Look for a way back into the Prism and ask the dream figure what they know.

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_58.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_58.text: *Questions gnaw at your mind like a tadpole at its host.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_49.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_49.text: *What is this Astral Prism? Who is this dream figure? And what makes Vlaakith so desperate to slay them?*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_57.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_57.text: *For now, the answers are locked tightly away. But there is one thing you are most certain of:*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_6.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_6.text: *Vlaakith will stop at nothing to retrieve the Prism - even if it means sacrificing Lae'zel of K'liir, her most faithful champion.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_68.speaker: Lae'zel
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_68.text: Find the zaith'isk inside the crèche and cleanse yourself of the parasite.

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_20.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_20.text: *You want little more to rid yourself of the ghaik tadpole in your head.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_42.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_42.text: *Vlaakith knows this too. Perhaps the zaith'isk will cleanse you - or perhaps the Undying Queen will see that it kills you.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_52.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_52.text: *As long as you carry the Prism - and the one inside - you remain Vlaakith's prey.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_35.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_35.text: *Even faith is no shield when it's your own goddess who would shatter you.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_64.speaker: Lae'zel
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_64.text: Do what you do best: fight. Bleed your own people if they come for your head.

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_15.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_15.text: *It was in Vlaakith's name that you learned the art of the blade. It was by her protocol that you sought purification.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_65.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_65.text: *You can carry yourself tall knowing you were loyal in both deed and intent. You are no heretic.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_30.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_30.text: *Let Vlaakith's servants come for you if they dare. You will show them who embodies the true essence of the githyanki.*

SD_AfterCrecheReflection_60.speaker: Narrator
SD_AfterCrecheReflection_60.text: *And come, they most certainly will. Whoever this dream figure, Vlaakith would clearly sacrifice her own faithful to slay them.*

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: The camera shows the player sleeping. Behind them, Lae'zel's face appears, whispering into their ear.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_17.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_17.text: Don't say a word. Just listen.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_17.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_30.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_30.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_13.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_13.text: A parasite grips my mind. My own people hunt me. But I am gnawed by an even greater torment.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_13.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_8.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_8.text: A parasite grips my mind. Kith'raki betray their own queen. But I am gnawed by an even greater torment.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_8.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_47.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_47.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_10.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_10.text: My thoughts are hallowed ground. Yet you've crawled your way in. Uninvited.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_10.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_20.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_20.text: I am obsessed by the ground under your feet and the wind over your head. I see your face just before I sleep and after I wake.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_20.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_14.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_14.text: I ask myself: are you worthy?
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_14.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_27.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_27.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. There is only one way for you to prove it.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_27.context: NodeContext: ZHOCK VOH-nahsh DOO. (Source of my bruises.) Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_44.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_44.text: Slaying our enemies in coldest blood?

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_5.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_5.text: A fine sentiment. But I require more.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_24.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_24.text: We fight. I test you in battle.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_24.context: NodeContext: In normal tone, but not aggressive.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_18.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_18.text: Dance with me. Bleed with me. Bruise me so that you might possess me.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_18.context: NodeContext: In normal tone, but not aggressive.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_23.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_23.text: Let's fight. I will show you that I'm worthy of your obsession.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_0.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_0.text: Ha! Prepare yourself, and prove your worth to me.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_12.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_12.text: Do it then. Make me yours.
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_12.context: NodeContext: Intensely but with some affection and amusement. She is fighting her lover as a test of passion.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_6.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_6.text: Sorry, but no. This is too intense for my liking.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_45.speaker: Narrator
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_45.text: *Your parasites stir. You make a fleeting connection. You feel a single heartbeat - and the bond is nearly broken.*

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_32.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_32.text: Say 'go', and I will go. And I will speak of this no longer.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_42.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_42.text: I'd rather fight. Let's see who's worthy of whom.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel rises to her feet. The player rises to theirs. They enter battle stance.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_11.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_11.context: NodeContext: Intensely but with some affection and amusement. She is fighting her lover as a test of passion.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel pulls away and there is only silence. The camera pulls back to reveal the player alone. Lae'zel is gone.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_25.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_25.text: Letting you always have your way?

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_19.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_19.text: That is how you earn my trust. Not how you earn my flesh and spirit.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_40.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_40.text: Get out of here, Lae'zel. You're being a nuisance.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_33.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_33.text: Stay. Tell me how you to earn your mind and body.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_46.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_46.text: Sorry. Our first time was our last.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_2.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_2.text: Drop this obsession. We're allies, nothing more.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_26.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_26.text: A parasite grips my mind. The shadows curse me. But I am gnawed by an even greater torment.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_7.speaker: Player
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_7.text: Get the Hells out of here. I'm trying to sleep.

ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_9.speaker: Lae'zel
ROM_SD_Romance2_WokenUpByLaezel_9.text: So was I. But my blood runs too hot.
